summary: Adds about 40 chests to Proudspire Manor
descriptionHtml:
PACK-RAT STORAGE version 1

Available in Proudspire manor in Solitude - Requires standard 
purchase if Proudspire Manor Quest

Adds over 30 Named Chests to one of the rooms -

Specific chests to hold specific types of gear like : Iron weapons / Armors - Daedric Weapons / Armors etc

Additional specialty chests like \"9 Divines Amulets\" \"Magical Necklaces\" and more



Includes Bow + Crossbow chest for Dawnguard (does not need Dawnguard)

NO AUTOMATIC SORTERS - SORRY

-------------------------------------------------
This mod does not require any other mod however may 
interfere with any mod that alters Proudspire Manor

It has been updated slightly however only new chests added - just overwrite old file



NOTE - This is my first Skyrim mod - meant more to help my slow computer storage
In future I may simply make a small area with chests you can COC too and fast travel from

If you can make a snapshot please do - I need to set that up in my script


NOTE: Should not require restarting Proudspire manor Quest - Should simply update it - Areas changed were static Items (some static Items were removed)
author: Myself
